tool.name: unweight fasta
tool.description: Transform fasta files with abundance weighting into unweighted

param.label: -l/--label: sequence label used for all records. fasta label lines will look like: >label_423
param.name: label

tool.help:
E.g. makes 3 fasta records from a weighted input fasta file containing the following record: >goodsample1_12_3 bc_val=20 AATGCTTGTCACATCGATGC
a .fasta file
